item.description:

item.title: Bread left by bin on midhurst hill, 15th October
item.description:
There is a person that keeps leading bread by bins on midhurst hill by the warren, this has happened on a number of occasions and its effecting people more so with animals that live around here, they keep eating this, its making them ill and one of residents dogs actually run across the road and could have been killed by this. they do this in the darkeness and always seems to be Sainsburys bread. Please can this be looked into asap.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Midhurst Hill, Bexley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bushes blocking pathway, 15th October
item.description:
All the bushes along the pathway of shottery close from 8 shottery close to 12 shottery close bushed need cutting back as covering the pathway and making it difficult for people with shopping bags to get through, also the bushes opposite also need cutting back and litter picked as when the pub turns out they are throwing bottles and urinating in them
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Shottery Close, London

item.title: Street light damaged and not working for ages, 15th October
item.description:
This street light was presumably hot by someone and has been leaning over, taped up, and not working for many weeks now. Can it be repaired please. It's very dark here in the mornings now.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bromley Hill, Plaistow, London
